# max(_:_:)

**Function**

Vector-scalar maximum.  Each component of the result is the maximum of the corresponding element of the input vector and the scalar.

## Declaration

```swift
func max(_ vector: simd_half16, _ scalar: Float16) -> simd_half16
```
